hammerfall.name: Hammerfall
hammerfall.desc: [Clubs] Aerial attacks do 25% more posture damage when blocked.

brain rattler.name: Brain Rattler
brain rattler.desc: [Clubs] Guardbreaking an opponent with your Critical rattles their brain in its container, causing increased blood loss and blurring their vision.

dispatch.name: Dispatch
dispatch.desc: [Clubs] Bear Trapped targets deal 20% less posture. Dazed targets deal 20% less posture. This can stack.
